ctx: intros m x x' z t Hmap_planar Hlink_expf.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros m x x' z t Hmap_planar Hlink_expf. unfold Br1. intros H. destruct H as [Hexpf_zt | Hexpf_tt]. - apply expf_Br1_link; auto. - apply expf_Br1_link. -- auto. -- intros Hcontra. unfold not in Hexpf_tt. apply Hexpf_tt. apply expf_transfert. ++ apply Hmap_planar. ++ apply Hmap_planar. ++ unfold y, y'. apply H. ++ right; left; apply Hexpf_zt.
